bibl.title: History of the Graeco-Latin Fable. Translated by Leslie A. RAY and F. ROJAS DEL CANTO. Supplemented and Edited by the author with new references and fables by the Author and Gert-Jan VAN DIJK. Indices by Gert-Jan VAN DIJK. Volume Three. Inventory and Documentation of the Graeco-Latin Fable. (Mnemosyne. Supplementum 236.)
bibl.note: Éd. originale: Historia de la fábula greco-latina. Volumen 3. Inventario y documentación de la fábula greco-latina (Madrid, 1987).

ADRADOS Francisco Rodríguez, History of the Graeco-Latin Fable. Translated by Leslie A. RAY and F. ROJAS DEL CANTO. Supplemented and Edited by the author with new references and fables by the Author and Gert-Jan VAN DIJK. Indices by Gert-Jan VAN DIJK. Volume Three. Inventory and Documentation of the Graeco-Latin Fable. (Mnemosyne. Supplementum 236.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2003, 8°, xlviii-1168 pp. ISBN 90-04-11891-8. €240.
Adrados Ray Rojas del Canto van Dijk
